API module

class API.API(waypoint0, waypoint1, vehicletype, speedprofile, mode)

Bases: object

Route Input

Parameters

  • waypoint0 (str or None) – Starting point of the route with the form “lat,long”, defaults to None

  • waypoint1 (str or None) – Ending point of the route with the form “lat,long”, defaults to None

  • vehicletype (str or None) – Type of energy concatenate with Consumption L/100km, defaults to None

  • speedprofile (str or None) – Behavior of the driver “fast” or “default”, defaults to None

  • mode (list[str]) – List to set-up the route of the type [‘behavior=[fastest,shortest];type_of_vehicule=[truck];traffic:default’], defaults to None

call(KEY)

Call the Here API

Parameters

KEY (str or None) – API KEY to be connected to the Here API, defaults to None

Returns

Response of the API call

Return type

json
